title: Add viewport scroll percentage to output pane header
description:
Show scroll position in output pane header:

When content overflows viewport, show percentage:
'Agent Output (45%)'

Implementation:
if m.viewport.TotalLineCount() > m.viewport.VisibleLineCount() {
    scrollPct := int(m.viewport.ScrollPercent() * 100)
    header = fmt.Sprintf("Agent Output (%d%%)", scrollPct)
}

Update on:
- Initial content load
- Scroll navigation (j/k, ctrl+d/u, g/G)
- Window resize
- New output appended

Match ticks behavior exactly.
